name: riki_spawn_08
text: I speak softly, but carry a sharp knife.

text: Since you put it like that.

text: Heh-ho, you didn't see that coming.

name: riki_kill_04
text: You were my target all along.
text_simple: you were my target all along

name: riki_kill_06
text: Anyone could see that it was your time.

name: riki_kill_07
text: I do my work at the cutting edge.

name: riki_kill_09
text: What you see is what gets you.

text: There are none so stabbed as those who will not see.

name: riki_kill_12
text: I'd've done that one for free.
